POR.SECTION_1_TEXT_1: To avoid delays when verifying your account, please make sure:
POR.SECTION_1_TEXT_2: Your NAME, ADDRESS, ISSUE DATE and ISSUER are clearly visible.
POR.SECTION_1_TEXT_3: The submitted proof of residence document is NOT OLDER THAN THREE MONTHS.
POR.SECTION_1_TEXT_4: You submit color photographs or scanned images in HIGH QUALITY (at least 300 DPI)
POR.SECTION_2_TITLE: AN ACCEPTABLE PROOF OF RESIDENCE IS:
POR.SECTION_2_LIST_ITEM_2: A utility bill (electricity, water, internet, etc.).
POR.SECTION_2_LIST_ITEM_3: A government-issued document (tax statement, certificate of residency, etc.).
POR.WARNING: We cannot accept the address on your submitted identity document as a valid proof of residence.

STAKE.TITLE: Stake
STAKE.DEFI_TEXT: Staking DeFi style will use your own wallet outside of the exchange. To start you are required to establish a connection, once connected you can stake and start earning directly from your wallet.
STAKE.PERIOD_SUBTITLE: Longer you stake the more you are rewarded. Select the duration of stake below.
STAKE.VARIABLE_TEXT: *{0} about how the variable rate works.
STAKE.REVIEW_NOTE: Duration is measured by the timing of the Ethereum blocks. Please check and confirm the details above before you stake as unstaking early will result in a percentage of your stakes principle to be deducted and earnings forfeited.
STAKE.WAITING_TEXT: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
STAKE.ERROR_SUBTITLE: If this was a mistake you can go back and retry
STAKE.COMPLETED_TOOLTIP: Stake is mature. Continue staking to earn more rewards or unstake to claim rewards.
STAKE.INSTALL_METAMASK: You must install Metamask into your browser: https://metamask.io/download.html

2.TEXT: the highest bonus rewards on your earnings

UNSTAKE.TITLE: Unstake
UNSTAKE.EARLY_WARNING_TITLE: Looks like you are trying to unstake early
UNSTAKE.EARLY_WARNING_TEXT_1: This could lead to a percentage of your initial principle stake being deducted and all earnings being forfeited.
UNSTAKE.EARLY_WARNING_TEXT_2: Are you sure you want to proceed?
UNSTAKE.SLASH_FOOTNOTE: *All amounts slashed are distributed to remaining stakers. Please consider the slashed amount from initial principle, the earnings forfeited and duration remaining and determine if the value lost in unstaking early is worth the cost.
UNSTAKE.AMOUNT_NOTE: Amounts will be distributed to your wallet address
UNSTAKE.PENDING_EARNINGS_FOOTNOTE: *Pending earnings are amounts that have not cleared and require a blockchain transaction in order to be added to your total receiving amount.

SUMMARY.TITLE: Summary
SUMMARY.ACCOUNT_ASSETS_TXT_1: Displayed is a summary of all your assets.
SUMMARY.ACCOUNT_ASSETS_TXT_2: Holding a large amounts of assets will entitle you for an account upgrade which includes a unique badge and lower trading fees.

SUMMARY.ACCOUNT_DETAILS_TXT_2: Your trading account age, activity level and total account assets amount will determine if your account is eligible for an upgrade.
SUMMARY.ACCOUNT_DETAILS_TXT_3: Maintaining your account level requires constant trading and maintaining a certain amount of deposited assets.
SUMMARY.ACCOUNT_DETAILS_TXT_4: Periodic downgrading of accounts will occur if activity and assets are not maintained.
SUMMARY.FEES_AND_LIMIT_TXT_1: Becoming a crypto trader marks new beginning. Armed with wits, will and speed only by taking risks and trading will you be allowed to update your account.
SUMMARY.FEES_AND_LIMIT_TXT_2: Each account has its own fees and deposit and withdrawal limits.

REVIEW_DEPOSIT.NOTE: To avoid delays make sure that your deposit's amount, note and the transaction ID match with the details above. If issues shall arise please contact support.

DEPOSIT_FEE_NOTE: Note, the total amount deposited to your account will be the amount minus the deposit fee
AMOUNT_LABEL: Enter the amount deposited (must be identical to the actual amount)
TRANSACTION_ID_LABEL: Enter the transaction ID of the deposit
PENDING_DEPOSIT_TEXT_1: Your deposit is now in queue for verification and will remain in a pending state until cleared.
PENDING_DEPOSIT_TEXT_2: Typically deposits clear within 24h but can take up to 48h, after clearing your deposit amount minus the fee will be credited to your balance.
DEPOSIT_HOME_NOTE: To make a deposit please input the amount you will deposit from your own bank account. To avoid delays, make sure you the amount you enter below matches the actual amount that you will or have sent from your bank account.
DEPOSIT_TXID_NOTE: To avoid delays with your deposit please make sure to enter your unique note displayed above when making your bank deposit within the note or message of your transaction. Make sure the amount below matches what you actually deposit from you bank and that you include the transaction ID provided by your bank after the transaction has been made.
